channel.title: CVE Feed for ALSong -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ALSong -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-7809|2024-08-04T09:41:01.930Z -- alsong -- estsoft
item.description: ALSong 3.46 and earlier version contain a Document Object Model (DOM) based cross-site scripting vulnerability caused by improper validation of user input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by tricking the victim to open ALSong Album(sab) file.
